title: Massiv elementlari yig'indisi
description: Berilgan massivdagi barcha elementlarning yig'indisini hisoblang.
hints: For loop yoki sum() funksiyasidan foydalaning

title: Stringni teskari aylantirish
hints: String slicing yoki reverse() funksiyasidan foydalaning

title: Massivdagi eng kichik element
description: Berilgan massivdagi eng kichik elementni toping.
hints: Yoki for loop bilan barcha elementlarni solishtiring

title: Unli harflar sonini hisoblash
description: Berilgan stringdagi unli harflar (a, e, i, o, u) sonini hisoblang.
descriptionHtml: Berilgan stringdagi unli harflar (a, e, i, o, u) sonini hisoblang.
hints: Unli harflar: a, e, i, o, u

title: Faktorial hisoblash
description: Berilgan musbat butun sonning faktorialini hisoblang.
descriptionHtml: Berilgan musbat butun sonning faktorialini hisoblang. n! = n × (n-1) × (n-2) × ... × 1
hints: For loop yoki recursion ishlatishingiz mumkin
